description: This hike is short but leads to a beautiful waterfall.  It's not a big secret if you live in sydney but most other people are not aware of this treasure.  There are some ropes to take you down the steep slope to the base of the fall where you can go for a nice dip!
directions: Highway 4 towards Sydney,  turn on Gillis Lake Rd and park downstream of the bridge over Gillis Lake Brook at 46.050472, -60.392132
title: Gillis Lake Fall
